      NettyPacketBuffer NettyPacketBuffer.writeByteA(int val) 
      NettyPacketBuffer NettyPacketBuffer.writeByteC(byte val) 
      NettyPacketBuffer NettyPacketBuffer.writeByteC(int val)
      public boolean isEmpty() { return payload.position() == 0; } public PacketBuilder startBitAccess() { bitPosition = payload.position() * 8; return this; } public PacketBuilder finishBitAccess() { payload.position((bitPosition + 7) / 8); return this; } public PacketBuilder putBits(int numBits, int value) { if(!payload.hasArray()) { throw new UnsupportedOperationException("The IoBuffer implementation must support array() for bit usage."); } int bytes = (int) Math.ceil((double) numBits / 8D) + 1; payload.expand((bitPosition + 7) / 8 + bytes); byte[] buffer = payload.array(); int bytePos = bitPosition >> 3; int bitOffset = 8 - (bitPosition & 7); bitPosition += numBits; for(; numBits > bitOffset; bitOffset = 8) { buffer[bytePos] &= ~BIT_MASK_OUT[bitOffset]; buffer[bytePos++] |= (value >> (numBits-bitOffset)) & BIT_MASK_OUT[bitOffset]; numBits -= bitOffset; } if(numBits == bitOffset) { buffer[bytePos] &= ~BIT_MASK_OUT[bitOffset]; buffer[bytePos] |= value & BIT_MASK_OUT[bitOffset]; } else { buffer[bytePos] &= ~(BIT_MASK_OUT[numBits] << (bitOffset - numBits)); buffer[bytePos] |= (value & BIT_MASK_OUT[numBits]) << (bitOffset - numBits); } return this; } public PacketBuilder put(IoBuffer buf) { payload.put(buf); return this; }
